column5: hey guys, im picking up a jon boat for some of the small lakes i fish. I have been looking at the jon boat trailers but theyre super expensive. I have a shore landr that i used for a deep v tinner, just wondering if the gliders are adjustable if need be and if anyone has ever done this? Thanks in advance Bassmaster
Bunks are adjustable but rollers usually aren't.  Either way, it may not sit perfect, but it's nothing a few ratchet straps can't fix.
Yea thats what i figured thanks a lot Chris!
I would go with a cheap utility trailer..

It was kind of a bad question, got it all figured out now i can adjust my gliders and make it work, thanks for the help anyway guys. Jumped the gun asking lol, just had to go in my garage and look at it.
